entities.name: Introduction
entities.description:
# Bootstrap DSP
![Bootstrap DSP created by Foxbox Digital](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/4j183ajh/production/b0451c2ed326aa6662617b30a74b1f8d4af8d323-1920x838.png)

Make developing with Bootstrap 5 even easier by using our free design system package (DSP) for Visual Studio Code. Gain direct access to Bootstrap code snippets and documentation with Intellisense right in the VS Code editor. This allows you to stay in flow and focus on development, instead of switching between your editor and the docs.

It's built from the [XD-Bootstrap-v.5-UI-Kit](https://assets.adobe.com/public/4ed7617e-4c25-4294-6cc0-d240c39f8a7e) CC Library.

## Languages
Bootstrap DSP supports code snippets for:
- HTML
- React

Want more? Please open an issue in our [Github repo](https://github.com/foxbox-digital/bootstrap-dsp).


---

Created by the [Foxbox Digital](https://foxbox.com) team.
